sentences.sContent: How is it that the successful motivate themselves to keep at it when others fall by the wayside?
sentences.sContent_eng: How is it that the successful motivate themselves to keep at it when others fall by the wayside?
sentences.sCn: 当其他人跌倒在路旁时，他们是如何激发自己坚持下去的？

sentences.sContent: To instance only one point: till then I had cared very little about plants and flowers, but now I found myself eagerly interested in every blossom, in every growth of the wayside.
sentences.sContent_eng: To instance only one point: till then I had cared very little about plants and flowers, but now I found myself eagerly interested in every blossom, in every growth of the wayside.
sentences.sCn: 只要举个例子就看得出来了：在这之前，我很少留意于草木花卉，可是现在我发现自己对路边每朵绽开的鲜花、每根生长的小草都兴趣十足。

sentences.sContent: She beheld the minister advancing along the path, entirely alone, and leaning on a staff which he had cut by the wayside.
sentences.sContent_eng: She beheld the minister advancing along the path, entirely alone, and leaning on a staff which he had cut by the wayside.
sentences.sCn: 她看到牧师正沿着小径走来，他只身一人，只是手中接着一根从路边砍下的手杖。
